outline:
1. to press, drive, oppress, exact, exert demanding pressure
    1. (Qal)
      1. to press, drive
      2. to exact
      3. driver, taskmaster, ruler, oppressor, tyrant, lord, exactor of tribute (participle)
    2. (Niphal) to be hard pressed
kjv_def: distress, driver, exact(-or), oppress(-or), [idiom] raiser of taxes, taskmaster.
strongs_def: to drive (an animal, a workman, a debtor, an army); by implication, to tax, harass, tyrannize
